cs.AI, cs.CC, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the integration of argumentation and decision theory, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also proposes a formal framework, which involves mathematical modeling and analysis, making it relevant to computational complexity (cs.CC) and data structures (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the validation of models, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper discusses the normative foundations of the proposed framework, which could be relevant to cryptography and security (cs.CR).
